projects.title: Vibin.
projects.subtitle: Spring Boot, React, PostgreSQL, Bootstrap
projects.description: A web app that analyzes user input using NLP and recommends Spotify songs based on their mood, integrating with the Spotify's Auth Flow and Web API for real-time suggestions.

projects.title: BookReviews
projects.subtitle: PHP, MySQL, HTML, JavaScript, Bootstrap
projects.description: A dynamic Content Management System (CMS) designed to serve as a centralized platform for book enthusiasts. Features user management and authentication, administrative controls, visitor access, and book data management.

projects.title: Cozy Weather
projects.subtitle: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Weather API
projects.description: Search for and access today's weather at any location. Enjoy the dynamic background that updates depending on time of day. Inspired by Studio Ghibli.
